title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5400.2 - Designation of records access officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5400.2 - Designation of records access officer

State Regulations
(a) The executive director is responsible for
insuring compliance with the regulations herein, and designates the following
person as records access officer: Assistant Counsel

One World Trade Center, Suite 8901

New York, N.Y. 10048
(212)
775-0010

The records access officer shall insure that
personnel: (1)
maintain an up-to-date
subject matter list; (2)
assist the
requester in identifying requested records, if necessary; (3)
upon locating the records, take one of
the following actions: (i) make records
available for inspection; or
(ii)
deny access to the records in whole or in part and explain in writing the
reasons therefor; (4)
upon request for copies of records: (i) make
a copy available upon payment or offer to pay established fees, if any, in
accordance with section
5400.8
of this Part; or
(ii)
permit the requester to copy those
records. (5)
upon
request, certify that a record is a true copy; and
(6)
upon failure to locate records, certify
that: (i) the corporation is not the
custodian for such records; or
(ii)
the records of which the corporation is a custodian cannot be found after
diligent search. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5400.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
